revised_title: A Comprehensive Guide to Royal Pharmacopaea and Natural Philosophy
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of three books: the Royal Pharmacopaea, which covers various chemical preparations and pharmaceutical practices, and two books on natural philosophy. The natural philosophy section discusses topics such as the principles of motion, the nature of vacuum, the system of the world, and the motions of water and air. The author also presents his thoughts on gravity, loadstone, transparency, and refraction.
